backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a calorie burn tracker with user profiles, activity logging, daily calorie goals, diet plan generation, and access control/blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three workout planner features (mutation hook, results component, planner view/navigation) to their target files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference for the app's component and hook structure.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark modes including colors, borders, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering a sticky three-tab navigation (Calorie Tracker, AI Diet Planner, Workout Planner) and conditionally displaying CalorieTracker, DietPlannerView, or WorkoutPlannerView based on the active tab and auth state.
frontend/src/components/ActivityForm.tsx: Form component for logging calorie burn activities with fields for name, duration, and difficulty, auto-calculating calories and submitting via the useAddActivity mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ActivityList.tsx: Displays a scrollable, sorted list of calorie-burn activities as cards with difficulty badges, timestamps, and an empty/loading state.
Shows aggregate stats (total calories, duration, activity count) and a daily goal progress bar fetched via a query hook, with skeleton loading states.
Form component for selecting a fitness goal and optionally entering user stats (age, weight, height, activity level) before submitting to generate a diet plan.
Top-level view for the AI diet planner that gates access behind Internet Identity authentication and orchestrates form submission, result display, and regeneration.
Renders a generated diet plan including macro breakdown bars, per-meal cards with nutrition details, and regenerate/reset action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright year and a branded link to caffeine.ai.
Card form that lets authenticated users set or update their daily calorie burn goal, showing the current goal and using a mutation hook with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header displaying the CalorieBurn logo and a login/logout button that uses Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Centered card prompting unauthenticated users to sign in via Internet Identity, highlighting security, privacy, and activity tracking features.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutPlannerVi: Orchestrates the AI workout planner UI: shows a banner, guards with auth state, renders the goal form, and displays results with regenerate/reset support.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutPlanResul: Displays a generated workout plan with per-exercise cards, a weekly schedule grid, and options to regenerate or reset the plan.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) backend actor using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and hook for managing authentication state (login, logout, identity persistence) via DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching/mutating activities, daily calorie goals, diet plans, and workout plans against the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, including diet and workout planner color schemes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to extract, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens (primary, accent, diet, workout, sidebar, chart, etc.) and enables typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the CalorieBurn AI fitness app, its existing implemented features (workout plan hook, results component, planner view), and pending feature requests for backend workout plan generation.
